ygData.subject: Re: Rune I and magic armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes carry a supply.  Also, magic armour : I have woven armour, only one more ac than cloth and its magic as well.  I would like to hear about the benefits of
ygData.messageBody:
Yes carry a supply. Also, magic armour : I have woven armour, only one
more ac than cloth and its magic as well. I would like to hear about the
benefits of magic over cloth as well. I suspect that this armour may effect
your magic resistance, though I have not checked stats to verify this...
try removing your armour, study your stats, and put it back on and see
which stats are effected if not only ac.

At 02:56 PM 5/24/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
>Just so I understand, Rune I does consume a stone each time you cast
>it, right? I should carry a supply of these stones around?
>
>Is there any reason to prefer netted over cloth? same ac but it is
>magic. Does magic armor make any difference to getting hit?
>
>
>thanks
>
>--- osmosis <osmosis@...> wrote:
>> From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
>>
>> 1. Rune I is a great spell, its a lot like divine
>> aura (cleric). More or
>> less it grants invunerability for a short time which
>> I'm sure you can
>> imagine is quite handy. A good spell to have!
>
